% Preface


    \chapter{Preface}

    This manual is the complete technical documentation for StarForth, a FORTH-79
    compliant virtual machine implementation designed for embedded systems,
    microkernel environments (L4Re), and minimal OS targets.


    \section{Document Organization}

    This manual is organized into the following parts:

    \begin{description}
        \item[Part I: Introduction] Quick start guide, overview, and architecture
        \item[Part II: User Guide] Building, testing, and using StarForth
        \item[Part III: Developer Guide] Adding words, extending the VM, porting
        \item[Part IV: Technical Reference] Complete API documentation (Doxygen)
        \item[Part V: Appendices] Build options, security, contributing guidelines
    \end{description}


    \section{Who Should Read This}

    \begin{itemize}
        \item \textbf{Users:} Start with Part I (Introduction) and Part II (User Guide)
        \item \textbf{Developers:} Read Part III (Developer Guide) and Part IV (API Reference)
        \item \textbf{Porters:} Focus on Architecture and Platform Integration chapters
        \item \textbf{Security Auditors:} See Security and Testing chapters
    \end{itemize}


    \section{Conventions Used}

    \begin{itemize}
        \item \texttt{Monospaced text} indicates code, commands, or file paths
        \item \textbf{Bold text} emphasizes important concepts
        \item \textit{Italic text} introduces new terminology
        \item Stack effects shown as: \texttt{( before -- after )}
    \end{itemize}

    \mainmatter

    macros are documented with their parameters, return values, and usage examples.

    \chapter{Bibliography}

    \begin{thebibliography}{99}

        \bibitem{forth79}
        FORTH-79 Standard,
        \textit{FORTH Standards Team},
        1979.
        \url{http://forth.sourceforge.net/standard/fst79/}

        \bibitem{forth83}
        FORTH-83 Standard,
        \textit{FORTH Standards Team},
        1983.

        \bibitem{ansi-forth}
        ANS FORTH Standard (X3.215-1994),
        \textit{Technical Committee X3J14},
        1994.

        \bibitem{l4re}
        L4Re Operating System Framework,
        \textit{Technische Universität Dresden},
        \url{https://l4re.org/}

        \bibitem{starshipos}
        StarshipOS Project,
        \textit{Robert A. James},
        \url{https://github.com/rajames/StarForth}
